Question: This person's first acting role was an uncredited bit part as a laboratory assistant in the 1955 film Revenge of the Creature.
Hints: This person was also cast as Two-Face in the Batman television show, but the series was canceled before filming began.
This person once again played a mysterious stranger—unshaven, wearing a serape-like vest, and smoking a cigar.
Upon release the film received major recognition in France and is considered one of this person's finest works by the French.
